ygData.subject: RE: New Lullaby theory
ygData.msgSnippet: ACK!  You can nod red Rooks at level 18?  Verant come quick!  Nerf!  Nerf! I couldn t nod a pack of blue lizards in Cazic-Thule at level 30-32.  That would
ygData.messageBody:
ACK! You can nod red Rooks at level 18? Verant come quick! Nerf! Nerf!
I couldn't nod a pack of blue lizards in Cazic-Thule at level 30-32. That
would have been a death sentence!

What someone needs to do is start a new bard on Test and run her up to 50
testing Lullaby the whole way. I nominate John(tm).

[47 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work

> Hmmm maybe I had a streak of very good luck last night. I was in
> the penthouse
> in the Aviak city and I had rooks nodding off left and right when
> we got in
> trouble. I was the lowest level up there at 18 and was not using any
> instruments. The sleeping rooks would occasionally wake up swing
> at me then
> nod back off. I just had to be sure I told the others to leave
> them alone and
> let them sleep. The rooks were red to me. At one time we had a
> Harrier that
> we were attacking and 2 sleeping rooks. Sure sounds to me like
> it is working
> properly.
>
> Katawn 18th Season Wood Elf Bard
> Mithaniel Marr Server
